WorkItem.Description:
•	We are using dll called 'Excel.dll(2.0.1.0)' (Specifically excelReader.AsDataSet()) method to read the data from .xlsx file. 
•	Its observed that, whenever data given with single decimal value, its reading as multiple decimal value with more than two precision.
•	Also observed that, this happens only with selective value like 300.1, 550.2, 550.3 etc. and it won’t happen with values like 100.1, 200.1, 
                400.1, 550.1 etc.
•	So, please ananlyze this issue and provide the needful resolution.
WorkItem.Summary: Its observed that, whenever data given with single decimal value, its reading as multiple decimal value with more than two precision
